title: Tormik Valley
text:
Turmik is a valley in the Karakorum mountain ranges in the <a href="Skardu%20District">Skardu</a> District of <a href="Gilgit-Baltistan">Gilgit-Baltistan</a>, <a href="Pakistan">Pakistan</a>. The valley has its source at the Stak-la and Basha valley lies to its east and <a href="Stak%20Valley">Stak Valley</a> to its west.
The valley is the second largest valley in term of population and area, Stak Valley being the first, in the <a href="Roundu%20Valley">Roundu Subdivision</a>.
